message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $1,200,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we are looking to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an exclusive opportunity not to be missed.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree your product is of high quality, the price point is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $900,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, we would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects both the value of the product and your assessment of its worth.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $925,000?

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. After reviewing your offer, we are pleased to counter with $937,500 for the product. We believe this price strikes a fair balance between the value of the product and your budget.
Alice, this is getting us closer. I'm willing to go up to $930,000 to make this deal happen today.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. In light of your commitment, we are pleased to counter with $935,000 for the product. We hope this proposal helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. I'm willing to split the difference and offer a final price of $932,500.  Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. We appreciate your flexibility. In response, we propose a final price of $934,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive for you.
